thread.title: DEFECTIVE WATER PUMP IN TOA PAYOH HDB LEAVES RESIDENTS WITHOUT WATER FOR 4 HOURS
thread.title_full: DEFECTIVE WATER PUMP IN TOA PAYOH HDB LEAVES RESIDENTS WITHOUT WATER FOR 4 HOURS

author: farhan
title: DEFECTIVE WATER PUMP IN TOA PAYOH HDB LEAVES RESIDENTS WITHOUT WATER FOR 4 HOURS
text:
DEFECTIVE WATER PUMP IN TOA PAYOH HDB LEAVES RESIDENTS WITHOUT WATER FOR 4 HOURS   Advertisement 
<Credits: The Alternative View> 
A defective water pump left residents of Block 147 Toa Payoh Lorong 2 under Bishan-Toa Payoh GRC without water for 4 hours Monday evening. The water supply disruption started at 5.30 pm and lasted until about 9.10 pm, according to a resident Joel Goh. 
Residents had to go to the void deck to collect clean water resulting in much inconvenience especially for elderly folks. From defective lifts to cracks in walls to leaking sewage pipes, it seems that more grants from HDB does not translate to better-run estates for PAP town councils. Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
